title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the actual inflation rate is less than the expected inflation rate and/or does not explain that with a recessionary gap the actual unemployment rate is greater than the natural rate of unemployment (or the short-run equilibrium is to the right of the long-run Phillips curve).

The response states that the actual inflation rate is less than the expected inflation rate and explains that with a recessionary gap the actual unemployment rate is greater than the natural rate of unemployment (or the short-run equilibrium is to the right of the long-run Phillips curve).
